EnumQueries.Name: ExecutionStatusType
EnumQueries.Query: WITH val AS ( SELECT CAST(1 AS int) AS [Value] UNION ALL SELECT [Value] + 1 FROM val WHERE [Value] < 9 ) SELECT [Value] ,CAST(CASE [Value] WHEN 1 THEN 'Created' WHEN 2 THEN 'Running' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Failed' WHEN 5 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 6 THEN 'EndedUnexpectedly' WHEN 7 THEN 'Succeeded' WHEN 8 THEN 'Stopping' WHEN 9 THEN 'Completed' END AS nvarchar(20)) AS [Name] ,CAST(CASE [Value] WHEN 1 THEN 'Execution created' WHEN 2 THEN 'Execution running' WHEN 3 THEN 'Execution cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Execution failed' WHEN 5 THEN 'Execution pending' WHEN 6 THEN 'Execution ended unexpectedly' WHEN 7 THEN 'Execution succeeded' WHEN 8 THEN 'Execution stopping' WHEN 9 THEN 'Execution completed' END AS nvarchar(50)) AS [Description] FROM val;
